DEFAULT-backup-desc: Create a backup of your series / episodes / watched list.
DEFAULT-calendar-mode-alert: If you prefer the calendar to show only the current week/month, change it here
DEFAULT-calendar-start-alert: Toggle between Sunday/Monday for start day of the week below
DEFAULT-manual-desc: If for some reason one of your TV shows hasn't updated, you can go to the Timers page and fire the auto-update timer manually
DEFAULT-sync-doit-alert: Clicking this button will keep your series in sync with other browsers
DEFAULT-sync-doit-btn: Keep series in sync between browsers
DEFAULT-sync-dont-alert: Clicking this button will stop syncing your local series list with other browsers
DEFAULT-sync-push-btn: Push local series list into the cloud
DEFAULT-sync-push-desc: Hit this button to push your current series list into the cloud. Sign in on another browser with the same google account and your series list will automagically be synced.
DEFAULT-topsites-hide-alert: Clicking the button will hide the list of your most visited sites from the new tab page
DEFAULT-topsites-hide-btn: Hide the Most Visited Sites from the new tab page
DEFAULT-topsites-show-alert: Clicking the button will show a list of your 12 most visited sites on the new tab page
DEFAULT-topsites-show-btn: Show Most Visited Sites in the new tab page
DISPLAY-background-opacity-alert: Selecting a button below will set the background image transparency to the chosen percentage.
DISPLAY-locale-alert: Select one of the following Locales to override the default.
HOMESERIES-addshow-addtolist-tooltip: Add series to your favorites list
HOMESERIES-addshow-protip: Pro Tip: Hit [return] to add the first search result to your favorites
HOMESERIES-addshow-returntofavlist-toolt: Click to return to your favorites list
HOMESERIES-addshow-starttyping: Start typing to search for shows to add to your favorites list
HOMESERIES-addshow-typeseriesname-placeh: Type a series name to add to your favorites
HOMESERIES-noseries-desc: Make DuckieTV work for you by adding the TV shows you like. Shows that are currently airing will appear on the calendar so that you can easily keep track of what is airing when.
SERIE-mark-range-desc: You are now in range selection mode. Click on an episode to set that as the last episode you have watched. All episodes up to and including that will be marked as watched. Dismiss this notification
TORRENT-autostop-disabled-alert: Clicking the button below requires you to click stop to end seeding finished torrents
TORRENT-autostop-enabled-alert: Clicking the button below automatically stops the torrent when it reaches 100%
TORRENT-directory-folder-hide-alert: Clicking the button below removes the 'open containing folder' button from the menu in the calendar if you selected a torrent for the show
TORRENT-directory-folder-show-alert: Clicking the button below adds the 'open containing folder' button to the menu in the calendar if you selected a torrent for the show
TORRENT-functions-hide-alert: Clicking the button below will hide all torrent related functionalities throughout the app
TORRENT-functions-show-alert: Clicking the button below enables all torrent related functionalities throughout the app
TORRENT-progressbar-hide-alert: Clicking the button below removes the progress bar that appears on an episode in the calender while downloading
TORRENT-progressbar-show-alert: Clicking the button below adds a progress bar that appears on an episode in the calender while downloading
TORRENT-quality-desc: Make a choice below to limit your episode searches to a specific quality.
TORRENT-quality-select-desc: If you select '720p' this will append '720p' to the default [seriesname] S[seasonnumber]E[episodenumber] search string.
TORRENT-quality-select-desc2: This does not work as a 'minimum quality' search!
TORRENT-streaming-disabled-alert: Clicking the button below disables the streaming option while downloading torrents
TORRENT-streaming-enabled-alert: Clicking the button below enables the streaming option while downloading torrents
TORRENT-tpb-desc: If for some reason ThePirateBay is blocked in your territory, use the button below to automatically resolve a working mirror that supports magnet links. If you have a preferred server, you may input that as well.
TORRENT-tpb-findmirror-btn: Find a random mirror that supports Magnet links
TORRENTCLIENT-desc-p1: You need to be running µTorrent v3.3.x on or
TORRENTCLIENT-desc-p3: You can now control your torrents straight from DuckieTV. Make sure µTorrent is running and accept the Pair request to enable automagic integration throughout the app
